WAP.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a system that uses radio waves to allow electronic equipment that is not physically attached to a computer, for example a mobile phone, to use the Internet
WAP.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a system for sending and receiving messages and connecting to the Internet using radio waves. WAP makes it possible for electronic equipment that is not physically attached to a computer, for example a mobile phone, to use the Internet
